programme.title: 'Son of Sam' killer caught
programme.short_synopsis: Son of Sam killer caught. Echoes of Sacco and Vanzetti case.
programme.medium_synopsis: Son of Sam serial killer caught. Remembering the 1920s Sacco and Vanzetti case.
programme.long_synopsis:
Son of Sam serial killer caught. Remembering the 1920s Sacco and Vanzetti case.

The sound quality on this recording is variable/poor.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
